name: Raccoon Riot (Hitman38)
description: In Raccoon Riot you control a raccoon who has become loose in a super mart late at night. While on one paw you love the store's low prices, on the other paw, you're a raccoon. So shopping etiquette is out the window. Gather as many supplies as you can before time runs out, and compete with your friends to see who can dash and grab the most.
